titleStmt.title: Israels just jvdge; or, The maiestrats brest-plate, against the darts of pride, envy, & hipocrisie: being enemies to iustice, mercy, & humility. Presented to the jmpartial maiestrats of this nation, especialy in the western parts, from whence the author (by Gods providence) drew his first breath; wishing them health here, and all happiness hereafter. / Written by Charles Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Charles, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Crowch, in Hosier-lane, for the author.,

notesStmt.note: With title page woodcut representing a figure of Justice.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
